text: avarannu avara oḍeyana munde nillisalāguva sandarbhavannu nīvu kāṇabēkittu! Avanu (allāhanu) avaroḍane ‘‘idellā satyavallave?’’ Endu kēḷuvanu. Avaru ‘‘nam'moḍeyanāṇe, idellavū khaṇḍita satya’’ ennuvaru. Āga avanu ‘‘nīvu (idannellā) dhikkarisida phalitānśavāgi idīga śikṣeyannu saviyiri’’ endu hēḷuvanu
